Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: Main Street continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: A large building on the west side glistens in the light. It seems to be plated with some sort of metal. Could it be gold? At each corner there is a tall, round tower with an even taller spire atop it. Lightning and static seems to ionize the air between the two towers at the front of the building. Across the street on the east side is a school for thieves and pickpockets.
